If for you to hold a cigarette is a conditioning, replace the cigarette with another object, such as a straw. Sometimes breathing through the straw can make you feel relieved of this habit. It is also recommended to use the dry cinnamon, that besides being a natural straw, has a plavor that you leave your breath fresh and free from the stench of the unpleasant smoke that the cigarette produces.

Stress is the evil of the century, sometimes very difficult not to have a day when we do not have some kind of stress. When you fee stressed, take a brief break in your day to have a relaxed conversation with friends, or take time to meditate. Meditation is a scientifically proven millenarian practice to deduce stress and anxiety, helping all smokers who intend to stop smoking.

If you get angry and anxious without smoking, of course your are feeling symptoms of nicotine withdrawl, and sso why don`t you use what the science has to offer? The various types of nicotine replacement are effective, scientifically validated and safe to use. Consult our doctor or pharmacist before starting any medication.

No! Smoking is only pleasurable and relaxing for the addicted! Try to remember the first time you smoked, it was wonderful? NO! It was disgusting, but you continued smoking because some social pretext or influence and started k=liking smoking. But actually, ou only started to tolerade smoking and became addicted to the nicotine. Nicotine is not a recreational drug, because the effect is too little to the first user to feel, but is one of the most addictive drugs. Now that you know that you don`t like smoking, you can try to use something to relax you a little bit, like an chamomilla tea of some passiflora supplements. Consult an doctor to recommend supplements.

There are a lot of smart ways to increase your energy, you can try supplements, teas, and vitamins to boost your energy, but the best way to have more energy is to start practice some exercice. Have a small walk on your neighborhood, try to do that every day on your free time, and each day try to increase a little bit the distance and speed. Don`t overdone, remember that you need to archive step by step to have a solid gains, Try to involve some family member or friends, and enjoy their company. Start the day with an exercice make your day more productive and happy.

Smoking causes 1 in 5 deaths according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and just trying to quit is worth a shot! But remember, you don’t have to do it alone. WeLivre was created with the goal of being a community for those with the same goal of being free from cigarette addiction. /n/n We are a community that offers support and information for those trying to kick the deadliest habit in the world. The idea is that the participants will write and share their thoughts, emotions, photos and processes through the journey of stop smoking. This is often considered the best way to reduce stress and get your thoughts onto "paper" instead of in your mind. Not to mention there are real rewards for contributing your story of quitting./n/n In addition, WeLivre provides you indicators based on the World Health Organization on your process of health improvement and a list of achievements that are unlocked one by one as the time goes by, motivating you to achieve your goal. In addition, we have the SOS tool that helps in times of craving./n/n Our goal is to be a platform that unites people so they can benefit each other by creating a global circle of support and encouragement that leads to a gradual increase in well-being and happiness in people\'s lives and in the world.
